## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project conventions and style guidelines
- [ ] No linting errors
- [ ] No TypeScript/ESLint errors
- [ ] Code is self-documenting with clear naming
- [ ] Complex logic is commented
- [ ] No debugging code or console.logs left in

### Testing
- [ ] Tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Tests updated for modified functionality
- [ ] All tests passing locally
- [ ] Test coverage is adequate
- [ ] Edge cases covered

### Review
- [ ] Self-reviewed my code
- [ ] Checked for potential security issues
- [ ] Verified error handling is appropriate
- [ ] Confirmed no sensitive data in code
- [ ] Ready for peer review

### Deployment
- [ ] Environment variables documented
- [ ] Migration scripts provided (if needed)
- [ ] Deployment instructions clear
- [ ] Rollback procedure documented
- [ ] Monitoring/alerting considered
